Settings.EmptySelectLabel: Select an existing die or create a new one

OverflowThreshold.Name: Dice Overflow Threshold
OverflowThreshold.Hint: Set the maximum number of dice icons displayed next to a player's name. Additional dice are hidden in a collapsible panel. Enter 0 to move all dice directly to the overflow panel.

ConfigureDiceTypes.Name: Shared Dice Configuration
ConfigureDiceTypes.Label: Configure Shared Dice
ConfigureDiceTypes.Hint: Configure and create the Shared Dice available in this world.

DeleteDialog.Warning: Are you sure? The following dice will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered:
DeleteDialog.Title: Delete Shared Dice

PlaceholderInfo.Title: Chat Messages
PlaceholderInfo.Explanation: The placeholders listed below are automatically swapped with their respective values in the final chat message.

LogLevel.Name: Log Level
LogLevel.Hint: Set the console log level for this module. Higher levels show more detailed logs.

enabled.Label: Enabled
enabled.Hint: Disabled dice are hidden and not usable but their data is preserved and they can be reenabled at any time.

name.Label: Name of the Die
name.Hint: The name given to this die (e.g. 'd20', 'Inspiration'). Used in UI elements and chat messages.

img.Label: Image
img.Hint: Select an image for this die.

maxPerUser.Label: Maximum Amount per User
maxPerUser.Hint: The maximum number of dice of this type a single user can possess. (0 for unlimited)

sortPriority.Label: Sort Priority
sortPriority.Hint: Determines the order in which dice are displayed on the player list. Dice with a higher priority are displayed closer to the user names.

allowGift.Label: Allow Gift
allowGift.Hint: Can players gift their own uses of this die to others?

msgOnAdd.Label: Message on Add
msgOnAdd.Hint: Chat message shown when a die is added to a user. If empty, no message is sent.

msgOnRemove.Label: Message on Remove
msgOnRemove.Hint: Chat message shown when a die is removed from a user. If empty, no message is sent.

msgOnUse.Label: Message on Use
msgOnUse.Hint: Chat message shown when a user uses/consumes a die. If empty, no message is sent.

msgOnGift.Label: Message on Gift
msgOnGift.Hint: Chat message shown when a user gives a die to another user. If empty, no message is sent.

editPermissions.Hint: Do users of a given role have permission to add or remove this die?

Notifications.unexpectedError: Unexpected error. Check developer console (F12) for details.
Notifications.onNegative: Shared Dice can not have negative values.
Notifications.onOverLimit: Users cannot have more than {diceTypeLimit} uses of {diceTypeName}.
Notifications.missingEditPermission: You do not have the required permissions to add or remove this die.
Notifications.noActiveOwner: No owner for the target document currently active. See console for details.
Notifications.unUserDataCleanFail: Failed to clean the flag data of {failCount} users. See console warnings for details.
